name: Philipp Rümmer
content: Homepage of Philipp Ruemmer Main Short CV Contact Service Publications Ongoing Projects Past Projects Teaching Photography Philipp Rümmer Professor of Theoretical Computer Science at the University of Regensburg. I also hold a position as Senior Lecturer at the Department of Information Technology, Uppsala University. My research interests cover (but are not restricted to) the following areas: Theorem proving and decision procedures, SAT/SMT solving Analysis of programs written in languages like Java, C#, C, C++, Simulink Modeling and analysis of timed/parameterised/concurrent systems Deductive verification, model checking, automatic test case generation Machine learning, automata learning, artificial intelligence, and their application in verification (and vice versa) Embedded systems and software Last modified: Wednesday, 21-Feb-2024 08:11:47 CET
